post.summary: Get all Run Metrics for the specific Experiment.
post.description: Get all Run Metrics for the specific Experiment with the specified query filters.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The Name of the resource group in which the workspace is located.

parameters.name: MergeStrategyType
parameters.description:
The type of merge strategy. Currently supported strategies are:
None - all logged values are returned as individual metrics.
MergeToVector - merges multiple values into a vector of values.
Default - the system determines the behavior.

parameters.name: MergeStrategyOptions
parameters.description: Controls behavior of the merge strategy in certain cases; e.g. when a metric is not merged.

parameters.name: MergeStrategySettings.SelectMetrics
parameters.description: Defines how to select metrics when merging them together.

requestBody.description: Query Parameters for data sorting and filtering.

200.description: The Run Metrics are returned successfully.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.summary: Get details of all child runs.
get.description: Get details of all child runs for the specified Run Id with the specified filters.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The Name of the resource group in which the workspace is located.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description:
Allows for filtering the collection of resources.
The expression specified is evaluated for each resource in the collection, and only items where the expression evaluates to true are included in the response.

parameters.name: $continuationtoken
parameters.description: The continuation token to use for getting the next set of resources.

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: The list of resource properties to use for sorting the requested resources.

parameters.name: $sortorder
parameters.description: The sort order of the returned resources. Not used, specify asc or desc after each property name in the OrderBy parameter.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description:
The maximum number of items in the resource collection to be included in the result.
If not specified, all items are returned.

parameters.name: $count
parameters.description: Whether to include a count of the matching resources along with the resources returned in the response.

200.description: The details of the child Runs are returned successfully.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

artifactId.description: The identifier of an Artifact. Format of ArtifactId - {Origin}/{Container}/{Path}.

container.description: The name of container. Artifacts can be grouped by container.

createdTime.description: The Date and Time at which the Artifact is created. The DateTime is in UTC.

origin.description: The origin of the Artifact creation request. Available origins are 'ExperimentRun', 'LocalUpload', 'WebUpload', 'Dataset' and 'Unknown'.

path.description: The path to the Artifact in a container.

container.description: The name of container. Artifacts can be grouped by container.

origin.description: The origin of the Artifact creation request. Available origins are 'ExperimentRun', 'LocalUpload', 'WebUpload', 'Dataset', 'ComputeRecord', 'Metric', and 'Unknown'.

path.description: The path to the Artifact in a container.

ArtifactContentInformation.description: Details of an Artifact Content Information.

path.description: The path to the Artifact in a container.

BaseEvent.description: Base event is the envelope used to post event data to the Event controller

artifactContentInformation.description: Artifact Content Information details of the Artifact Ids requested.

artifacts.description: Artifact details of the Artifact Ids requested.

errors.description: Errors occurred while fetching the requested Artifact Ids.

BatchArtifactContentInformationResult.description: Results of the Batch Artifact Content Information request.

endTimeUtc.description: The end time of the run in UTC.

parentRunId.description: The parent of the run if the run is hierarchical; otherwise, Null.

runId.description: The identifier for the run. Run IDs must be less than 256 characters and contain only alphanumeric characters with dashes and underscores.

startTimeUtc.description: The start time of the run in UTC.

status.description: The status of the run. The Status string value maps to the RunStatus Enum.

userName.description:
A user's full name or a service principal's app ID.
This is PII and should never be logged.

userObjectId.description:
A user or service principal's object ID.
This is PII and should never be logged.

userTenantId.description: A user or service principal's tenant ID.

target.description: The target of the error (e.g., the name of the property in error).

correlation.description: Dictionary containing correlation details for the error.

continuationToken.description: The token used in retrieving the next page.  If null, there are no additional pages.

nextLink.description: The link to the next page constructed using the continuationToken.  If null, there are no additional pages.

value.description: An array of objects of type ArtifactContentInformation.

continuationToken.description: The token used in retrieving the next page.  If null, there are no additional pages.

nextLink.description: The link to the next page constructed using the continuationToken.  If null, there are no additional pages.

value.description: An array of objects of type Artifact.

continuationToken.description: The token used in retrieving the next page.  If null, there are no additional pages.

nextLink.description: The link to the next page constructed using the continuationToken.  If null, there are no additional pages.

value.description: An array of objects of type Experiment.

continuationToken.description: The token used in retrieving the next page.  If null, there are no additional pages.

nextLink.description: The link to the next page constructed using the continuationToken.  If null, there are no additional pages.

value.description: An array of objects of type Run.

continuationToken.description: The token used in retrieving the next page.  If null, there are no additional pages.

nextLink.description: The link to the next page constructed using the continuationToken.  If null, there are no additional pages.

value.description: An array of objects of type RunMetric.

continuationToken.description: The continuation token to use for getting the next set of resources.

filter.description:
Allows for filtering the collection of resources.
The expression specified is evaluated for each resource in the collection, and only items where the expression evaluates to true are included in the response.
See https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/search/query-odata-filter-orderby-syntax for details on the expression syntax.

orderBy.description:
The comma separated list of resource properties to use for sorting the requested resources.
Optionally, can be followed by either 'asc' or 'desc'

top.description:
The maximum number of items in the resource collection to be included in the result.
If not specified, all items are returned.

code.description: The service-defined error code. Supported error codes: ServiceError, UserError, ValidationError, AzureStorageError, TransientError, RequestThrottled.

details.description: The related errors that occurred during the request.

message.description: A human-readable representation of the error.

target.description: The target of the error (e.g., the name of the property in error).

createdUtc.description: The time the run was created in UTC.

endTimeUtc.description: The end time of the run in UTC.

experimentId.description: The Id of the experiment that created this run.

parentRunId.description: The parent of the run if the run is hierarchical; otherwise, Null.

runId.description: The identifier for the run. Run IDs must be less than 256 characters and contain only alphanumeric characters with dashes and underscores.

startTimeUtc.description: The start time of the run in UTC.

status.description: The status of the run. The Status string value maps to the RunStatus Enum.

token.description: A token used for authenticating a run.

tokenExpiryTimeUtc.description: The Token expiration time in UTC.

userId.description: The Id of the user that created the run.

warnings.description: A list of warnings that occurred during the run.

endTimeUtc.description: The end time of the run in UTC.

parentRunId.description: The parent of the run if the run is hierarchical.

properties.description: The properties dictionary for the run. Properties are immutable.

startTimeUtc.description: The start time of the run in UTC.

status.description: The status of the run. The Status string value maps to the RunStatus Enum.

tags.description: The tag dictionary for the run. Tags are mutable.

target.description: The name of the compute target where the run is executed.

warnings.description: A list of warnings that occurred during the run.
